EmailTemplate.description: Email to NC/SC partners about the Florida launch
EmailTemplate.name: 18-0206 FL Launch Email- for NC/SC
EmailTemplate.subject: Guess what else is launching in Florida this week?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
What goes together better than solar power and the Sunshine State?
Nothing.
BlueWave is pleased to announce that our Home Solar Loan will be available in Florida very soon!
Who We Are BlueWave Solar (“BlueWave”) is a renewable energy company founded on a mission to provide Solar to Everyone, Everywhere. BlueWave partners with solar contractors like you to help achieve this mission!
Residential Solar Loan Our proprietary fintech loan platform will be our first product we launch in Florida. Our platform makes financing solar a smooth process for customers and installers alike.
Interested? Please contact our Florida Business Development Manager, John Michael Otis (803) 730-9289
Florida, we're almost ready to launch! In the next few days, we will share more information on our launch timing as well as what makes BlueWave a terrific partner for you.
We hope to partner with you to provide Solar for Everyone, Everywhere.
- All of us here at BlueWave
